section.name: Description
section.p: ExporterActionListener tag allows exporting HtmlDataTable content as an excel or a pdf file.
It is an action listener that can be attached to any action source component like commandButton.

section.name: Usage
section.source:
<h:commandButton value="export">
<s:exporterActionListener filename="myFile" fileType="<XLS or PDF>" for="<yourTableID>"/>
</h:commandButton>

blockquote.code: fileType="Attribute to specify whether to export an excel or a pdf file, possible values are {'XLS', 'PDF'}"
for="Id of the datatable to be exported"
filename="Optional attribute to specify the filename of the exported excel or pdf file"

section.name: Additional Information
section.p: see exporter.jsp in the Sandbox examples.
